titleStmt.title: Mr. George Oldner's invention to preserve ships from foundering, or sinking, at sea, etc. experimented & approv'd : and now propos'd for the universal good of all nations concern'd in navigation : as appears by the following proposal.

publicationStmt.date: 1698 ; and are to be had gratis.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
